Name: In Shape 2
About the game: In this minimalistic arcade game, you have to move and reshape your figure to match the passing figures. Triangle, square and circle. And also occupy the desired lane by jumping left and right. For each piece you pass, you get points, and the movement gradually accelerates, and the game becomes more difficult. Good luck.
